meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unable to be avoided or prevented.
meanings.sent1: The inviabilities of aging are inevitable for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The inviabilities of natural disasters can be devastating.
meanings.sent3: Despite his efforts, the inviabilities of traffic made him late for work.
meanings.sent4: The inviabilities of time catch up with us all eventually.
meanings.sent5: The inviabilities of change can be challenging to accept.

meanings.definition: The condition of being impossible to achieve or carry out.
meanings.sent1: The inviabilities of reaching the stars are beyond our current technology.
meanings.sent2: The inviabilities of winning the lottery are slim.
meanings.sent3: His plan to finish all the work in one day faced the inviabilities of time constraints.
meanings.sent4: The inviabilities of perfection can be a hindrance to progress.
meanings.sent5: The inviabilities of finding a flawless solution are rare.
